name: NSButton.BezelStyle
desc: Bezel styles used by the bezelStyle property.

items.name: case rounded
items.desc: A rounded rectangle button, designed for text.

items.name: case regularSquare
items.desc: A rectangular button with a two-point border, designed for icons.

items.name: case shadowlessSquare
items.desc: A rectangular button with no shadow, so it can abut the cells without overlapping shadows.

items.name: case smallSquare
items.desc: A simple square bezel style that can scale to any size.

items.name: case roundRect
items.desc: A bezel style appropriate for use as an action or auxiliary button in scope bars and title bar accessories.

items.name: case inline
items.desc: A button that has a solid round-rectangle border background.

items.name: case recessed
items.desc: A bezel style appropriate for use in scope bars and title bar accessories, similar to the bookmarks bar in Safari.

items.name: case disclosure
items.desc: A bezel style for use with a disclosure triangle.

items.name: case roundedDisclosure
items.desc: A bezel style for use with a vertically expanding and collapsing disclosure button.

items.name: case circular
items.desc: A round button with room for a small icon or a single character.

items.name: case helpButton
items.desc: A round button with a question mark providing the standard Help button look.

items.name: case texturedRounded
items.desc: A bezel style appropriate for use in the toolbar or title bar regions of a window.

items.name: case texturedSquare
items.desc: A bezel style appropriate for use with textured (metal) windows.
